original_text: And Balak did as Balaam had spoken; and Balak and Balaam offered on every altar a bullock and a ram.
korean_text: 발락이 발람의 말대로 준비한 후에 발락과 발람이 제단에 수송아지와 숫양을 드리니라

sentences.original_text: And Balak did as Balaam had spoken
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 발락은 발람이 말한 대로 행했고

sentences.original_text: and Balak and Balaam offered on every altar
